11.title: Comedy

choices: She gains weight from doing fattening mukbang vlogs
She purposely fattens herself up to spread a message about body positivity
113.content: How does Lilly get fat?
113.title: Lilly Singh

choices: Lilly is indifferent to her weight gain and allows it to continue
Lilly is embarassed about her weight gain and tries to stop it
Lilly enjoys her weight gain and tries to speed it up
1131.content:
"Yo what up world, it's ya girl Superwoman!" Lilly Singh exclaimed, excited to start her new video series. She had just gotten the most brilliant idea after hearing about a new genre of YouTube videos called "mukbangs" where people just sit and eat and talk to the camera for an extended period of time. She figured she could easily supplement her income on YouTube by combining her two favorite things: eating and talking.

"So to kick off my new mukbang series I've ordered a ton of fast food to chow down on while chatting with you guys," Lilly said as she panned the camera over to show a table covered in bags from a variety of fast food places. "Ah, smells so yummy," she said as she went cross-eyed and pretended to drool. Lilly sat down at the table and unwrapped a large burger and took her first bite. "Oh man this is so good. I'm gonna get so fat from doing this," she joked.

Over the next hour Lilly ate her way through the entire table of food while talking about anything that came to her mind along the way. By the end she was so stuffed and exhausted that she could barely finish her last bite, but she made a melodramatic effort to do so in her usual comedic way. "Uh I'm so full," she moaned as she rubbed her bloated stomach and stifled a burp. "Well I hope you guys all enjoyed this, I know I did. ~urp~ Leave a comment letting me know if I should keep doing videos like this. And remember, if you like it subscribe!"

-------------------------------------------------------------------

A few weeks later, Lilly's mukbang vlogs had become so popular that she started a new channel specifically for them. She still continued doing her regular comedy videos and daily vlogs, but she was now also doing an additional 4-5 mukbang videos a week. And since Lilly wasn't exactly the biggest health nut, the food that she ate for her videos was usually pretty fattening. It was typical for her to eat several thousand calories of fast food, donuts, sugary cereal, or anything else she thought sounded delicious in each video. And it wasn't long before her new diet began to have an effect on her figure.

After a couple of months, Lilly became noticeably chubby. In fact she had gained so much weight that in the middle of filming a new mukbang vlog, the button on her pants popped off and flew across the room. "Oh my god!" Lilly laughed, giving the camera a surprised look. "Well I guess that's what mukbang does to you." It wasn't the first time she had outgrown a piece of clothing, but it was the first time it happened on camera.

"Guess I should do these videos in stretch pants from now on," she joked, patting her big belly and jiggling it.
1131.title: Fattening mukbang v...

choices: Lilly is trying to fatten her friends up
Lilly's friends get fat without her direct interference
11311.content:
As time went on, Lilly's body continued to expand as her mukbangs grew in popularity. But she was having too much fun to care about her weight gain. After a while Lilly got the idea to invite some guests over to do mukbangs with her, starting with some of her friends from YouTube.

She had Colleen Ballinger on first since she was known for doing mukbang videos occasionally. The two girls spent nearly an hour eating candy on camera until they were both so full they could barely move and just sat there rubbing their distended bellies.

"Mmmm, that candy was so good," Colleen moaned with pleasure. "If I didn't have any self-control I'd probably gain about 800 pounds from eating so much of it."

"Yeah right," Lilly laughed at the thought of a hugely fat and obese Colleen. "I'd like to see that! Here," she said jokingly as she grabbed a large chocolate bar and shoved it towards Colleen's mouth, pretending to try and force feed her.

"No, stop!" Colleen resisted. "If I eat any more right now I'm gonna burst!" Lilly relented after a minute or so and ended the video with the two of them sitting with their pants unbuttoned, cradling their food babies with one hand and waving goodbye to the camera with the other.

For her next video, Lilly invited violinist Lindsey Stirling over to eat a huge amount of fast food. Lindsey had never done a mukbang video before, but she enjoyed herself so much that she decided she might have to start doing them on her channel from now on. Although seeing the amount of weight that Lilly had gained in such a short time from doing eating videos gave her pause, she decided it would be worth it to try and spice up her online content with something fun. "After all," Lindsey thought, "Lilly doesn't seem to mind being fat, so why should I mind if I put on a few pounds?"

Next, Lilly invited Rosanna Pansino to do a mukbang with her. They began by shooting a collab video for Nerdy Nummies where they baked a large unicorn-shaped cake together, then they filmed themselves eating it for Lilly's mukbang channel.

"That was a lot of fun!" Rosanna said, licking frosting off of her fingers after Lilly had turned the camera off. "But so many calories. If I didn't know any better I'd think you were trying to fatten me up!" The two girls laughed together at the ridiculous notion.
11311.title: Lilly keeps eating and getting fatter

choices: Lilly and her friends get ridiculously fat
Lilly and her friends start an obesity trend among YouTubers
113112.content:
Lilly and her friends began doing mukbangs together more often since both they and their viewers enjoyed them so much. Pretty soon the increased amount of food that they were all eating began to take a toll on their waistlines, and the three girls quickly packed on the pounds and chubbed up, almost becoming as fat as Lilly. By this point the four of them had been dubbed "The Fat Girls of YouTube" by the internet. They were somewhat insulted by this at first, but since their weight gain was pretty undeniable they decided to embrace the name and lean into it. They created a "Fat Girls of YouTube" channel where they would do collaborative mukbangs and other miscellaneous content together and began selling merchandise with their new logo on it. Over time, the new content that they created together gradually became more and more fattening.

One day after a particularly intense mukbang session, the four ladies sat around in Lilly's living room rubbing their fat bellies and trying not to pass out from being so full. Rosanna, being an extremely talented and creative baker, had spent the morning baking over a dozen massive cakes which the four fatties ended up demolishing in under an hour. Lindsey sat next to Colleen on the couch (since only two of them could fit on it) licking cake crumbs off a paper plate. The obese violinist tried to pull her shirt down to cover her massive gut, but it was no use. Her shirt kept riding up and exposing her blubbery belly to the world. Colleen faced a similar problem, having apparently grown too fat for the shirt she was wearing, but there was nothing to do about it now except pat her enormous belly and sit in admiration of Rosanna's baking skills. Rosanna really knew how to make food delicious and irresistible, but also seemed to have a tendency to make them extremely fattening, if her current size was any indication. Rosanna had gained so much weight from eating and taste testing her own baking creations that she was now the fattest woman in the group, having gained even more weight than Lilly despite Lilly having had about a 50 pound head start.

As the four fat women lay around in food comas, the wooden chair that Lilly was sitting in started making a low creaking noise until it suddenly collapsed under her weight, causing the four of them to burst out laughing in surprise. Lindsey and Colleen managed to heave their heavy bodies off the couch and waddle over to where Lilly now lay on the floor to try and help her up.

"Well, Ro," Lilly said, squeezing her own belly with both hands once she had finally gotten to her feet, "Those cakes you made sure were something. Now who's fattening who up?"
113112.title: Lilly's friends get fat

choices: YouTubers continue to get even fatter
A new "weight gain challenge" goes viral
1131122.content:
The Fat Girls of YouTube soon became one of the site's most popular channels. It seemed that everyone loved seeing Lilly Singh, Colleen Ballinger, Lindsey Stirling, and Rosanna Pansino gain weight and become supersized beauties. It wasn't long before other female YouTubers caught on to what was happening and decided to cash in on the new trend by fattening themselves up. And the more YouTubers became fat, the quicker the obesity trend spread until most women on the site were obese.

"I am so happy that I can eat whatever I want now!" a 400-pound Gabbie Hanna said excitedly to her camera while stuffing a large chocolate doughnut into her mouth. "This obesity fad is the best, most delicious thing that's ever happened to me. How do you guys like my new booty?" Gabbie stood up, wearing a too tight shirt that left most of her large belly exposed and a pair of sweatpants, and turned around shaking her enormous ass for the camera. She laughed as she caught a glimpse in the mirror of her whole body jiggling with her every move. Gabbie loved being able to be fat and confident at the same time, almost as much as she loved eating everything in sight. As with the other girls, her popularity had skyrocketed along with her weight, and it made her happy to know that she could let herself go and become absolutely massive and still maintain a loyal fan base. "Maybe I could have a new career as a sumo wrestler!" she joked while grabbing her belly with both hands and jiggling it.

Even SSSniperWolf, who had before mocked the concept of feederism in her videos, gave in to the trend and allowed herself to balloon up. She gained weight fairly rapidly, spending most of her time snacking while playing Fortnite. "I can't believe I ever made fun of people for wanting to be fat, this feels wonderful," she said with her mouth full of Oreos. "The only problem is that I keep outgrowing my clothes. That and I had to get a stronger chair to support my weight." Right as she said that, as if on cue, her chair broke and she collapsed to the floor flat on her back. "Damn, guess it's time for a new chair," she said as she struggled to get back up, a helpless pile of blubber jiggling around on the floor as she flailed her flabby arms about.

Liza Koshy, Jenna Marbles, Zoella, and iJustine all became absolute blimps and were completely unashamed of their massive weight gains. They flaunted their obesity at every opportunity and weren't shy about their extreme gluttony either, often stuffing themselves silly on camera and openly bragging about how much weight they had gained and how much fatter they planned to get.

It seemed one of the only holdouts to the trend was notorious fatphobe Nicole Arbour, who, desperate to be a contrarian, chose to remain thin and instead make a series of rant videos about why the obesity trend was stupid and why all the YouTubers getting fat were all idiots and sheep. But everyone mostly ignored her. Thin was no longer in and fat was officially where it was at.
1131122.title: Obesity trend

choices: Whoever gains the most weight in 30 days wins
First one to weigh 1,000 pounds wins
11311222.content:
Good times on YouTube. Good, delicious, fattening times. Once the obesity trend took off, it was only a matter of time before every popular female YouTuber had gained several hundred pounds. Anna Akana got so fat that she got stuck in the doorway of a bakery on her way out after a massive cake eating binge and had to have the door greased in order to fit her gigantic ass through. iHasCupquake changed her YouTube name to iCauseEarthquake due to her new weight causing floors and walls around her to shake violently whenever she walked. Even animation YouTubers like Jaiden Animations gained weight and began animating themselves fat in their videos. But as fattening as the obesity trend had been so far, this was only the beginning.

No one knew exactly who started it, but somehow in the midst of seeing so many women fatten up so quickly, the question arose among viewers of just how quickly it was possible for a person to gain weight. People would get into arguments in comment sections about which YouTuber they thought could get the fattest, and inevitably it was decided that there was only one way to settle these disagreements once and for all: a weight gain challenge.

Once the idea of a weight gain challenge spread among members of the YouTube community, it quickly became a viral phenomenon. Every female YouTuber became even more of a glutton than they already were and began doing everything else they could to purposely gain as much weight as physically possible in hopes of winning the challenge and being crowned the obesity queen of YouTube.
11311222.title: Weight Gain Challenge

113112221.content:
It was unofficially decided that whichever female YouTuber could gain the most weight in a 30 day period would win the challenge. And so, every woman on YouTube set out to pack on the pounds as quickly as possible in any way they could.

Kirstie Maldonado got the other members of Pentatonix to feed her round the clock and turn her into an even bigger tub of lard than she already had become, until she could no longer see her own feet past her elephantine belly.

Brizzy Voices began taking appetite enhancing supplements in order to increasing her gorging capabilities. Her transformation had been one of the most striking, having gone from stick thin to fat enough to be able to convincingly impersonate Jabba the Hutt, in both sound and appearance.

Molly Burke rapidly ate herself into immobility, yet still managed to dress as fashionably as ever. Suzy Berhow also reached the point of immobility after happily taking her love of food to an extreme and stuffing herself nearly 24/7. In fact, towards the end of the 30 days most of the women on YouTube had become immobile from gaining so much weight, and some used this development for new business opportunities. Gabbie Hanna began selling T-shirts and pants with her name and channel logo on them in size XXXXXL, which she would briefly model in every video before going back to gorging herself on pizza. Anna Akana started a business renting out forklifts to immobile YouTubers to help them get around after she herself had fattened up beyond the point of being able to walk unassisted. She kept two forklifts for herself though, one for mobility and the other to keep her home stocked with a never ending supply of fattening food.

As for The Fat Girls of YouTube, the four fatties who had started it all, they all ended up immobile too after trying their hardest to gain weight through their own methods. Colleen spent the entire month binging on German candy, Lindsey ate nothing but fast food, Rosanna fattened herself up with her baking creations, and Lilly just ate everything she could get her pudgy hands on.

After the 30 days were up, everybody posted their final weigh in videos and the winner turned out to be...
113112221.title: Whoever gains the most weight in 30 days wins

11311222122.title: Choice Branch 2

113112221221.content:
"Yo what up world, it's ya girl Superwoman, and guess what? It's finally here, the big day, the final weigh in! I've eaten a lot of good food to get here, so hopefully it all paid off!" Lilly gently patted her belly and then struggled for a few minutes to get up out of one of Anna Akana's forklifts and onto a special scale she had ordered that could handle a weight of up to 3,000 pounds. "Now remember, I weighed 585 pounds at the start of the challenge, so-" Lilly was interrupted by the electronic voice of her talking scale.

"You weigh nine hundred and eighty-seven point zero pounds," it said flatly. Lilly's jaw dropped upon hearing that number.

"Wow, 987 pounds!" she exclaimed. "I gained 400 pounds in a month! That's awesome! I should get a giant cake to celebrate." Lilly licked her lips at the thought of devouring yet another highly fattening cake. It would be her third one of the day. Lilly turned her camera off, got back into her forklift, and pulled her phone out from underneath one of her fat folds to order a celebration cake.

All the other weight gain challenge participants made similar videos weighing themselves and announcing their starting and ending weights. Some had to weigh themselves at truck-stops due to them having become too heavy for most normal scales. By the end, the final tally of everybody else's weights were:

Colleen Ballinger began the challenge weighing 570 pounds and ended at 890 pounds, a total gain of 320 pounds.

Lindsey Stirling started at 540 pounds and ended at 850 pounds, a gain of 310 pounds.

Rosanna Pansino started at 600 pounds and ended at 1,150, a gain of 550 pounds.

Gabbie Hanna went from 475 pounds to 960 pounds, a gain of 485 pounds.

SSSniperWolf gained 300 pounds, going from 608 to 908.

Liza Koshy ballooned up to 880 pounds from 500, a gain of 380.

Jenna Marbles porked all the way up to 900 pounds from 560, a gain of 440.

Zoella engorged herself from 500 pounds to 895, a gain of 395.

iJustine chubbed up from 480 to 800, a gain of 320.

Anna Akana blew up from 625 pounds to 1,130 pounds, a gain of over 500 pounds.

iHasCupquake fattened up to 975 pounds from 600, a gain of 375 pounds.

Jaiden Animations went from 450 pounds to 850, a gain of 400 pounds. For her weigh in video she drew herself as a giant blob sitting on a scale outweighing a large pile of gold bricks.

Kirstie Maldonado went from 630 pounds to 1,180, a gain of 550 pounds.

Brizzy Voices stuffed herself to 950 pounds from 540, a gain of 410 pounds.

Molly Burke went from 560 pounds to 1,110, a gain of 550 pounds.

Suzy Berhow fattened up to 1,035 pounds from 680, a gain of 455 pounds.

In the end, the challenge to see who could gain the most weight turned out to be a 3-way tie between Rosanna Pansino, Molly Burke, and Kirstie Maldonado, having each gained 550 pounds exactly.
113112221221.title: It's a tie

1131122212212.content:
As the three weight gain challenge champions, Rosanna, Kirstie and Molly decided to team up and create a joint channel together called "Tons of Fun". They decided to use it to display their talents and celebrate being the three fattest women on YouTube. For their first video they all tried on some supersized clothes that they ordered from Gabbie Hanna's morbid obesity line of merchandise. Despite being the largest sizes available, the outfits barely fit their half-ton bodies and didn't leave very much to the imagination. Kirstie struggled to squeeze a pair of extra extra large stretch pants over her massive, blubber covered thighs. Once she finally had them on she turned around to show off to the camera how tight they were on her jumbo-sized ass. Ro laughed at the ridiculous sight while trying and failing to pull an enormous shirt down over her own fat gut.

"How do I look, guys?" Molly asked as she finished struggling to button up her shirt. Molly looked like an overstuffed sausage in her obviously too small outfit. The buttons on her shirt were clearly not strong enough to contain her fat and looked like they were about to burst off at any moment. What's more, her belly spilled out from underneath it and completely covered her lap, hiding her skirt from view. She would have preferred to pull her skirt up over her belly but the skirt wasn't nearly large enough for it to fit that way.

"Here, let me help you," Kirstie said after noticing that Molly had miss-buttoned some of the buttons on her shirt. She slowly waddled over to where Molly was sitting and leaned over to undo one of the buttons, at which point a loud ripping sound was heard as Kirstie's pants gave way and tore, no longer able to contain the half-ton woman's ass.

After the viral success of their "Fat Girls Try On Tight Clothes!" video, the three girls went on to create even more content showcasing their new lives as morbidly obese women. Rosanna continued to cook, although her recipes were much more fattening now than when she was thin (which may have contributed to the three of them getting even fatter). Kirstie continued to sing, and even though the extra fat had changed her voice slightly she was able to adjust and still managed to belt one out sounding as beautiful as ever. Molly did some blind fat girl challenges, starting with a taste test challenge where she had Rosanna bake a few different things and then guess which flavor each one was supposed to be.
1131122212212.title: Something else happens

choices: Lilly keeps gaining until she's at least 400 pounds
Lilly keeps gaining until she's immobile
11313.content:
"Well," Lilly said, licking Krispy Kreme donut residue off of her fingers, "That's about it for today's video. Leave a comment below telling me what I should eat tomorrow. And as always, if you like it subscribe!" Lilly took a few seconds to struggle to her feet, then waddled over to her camera to turn it off. As she did so, she caught a glimpse of her reflection in the mirror and smiled. Despite having gained over 70 pounds, she loved the way she looked. "Damn girl, you gettin' THICC!" she said to herself, admiring her enlarged ass. "Nicki got nothin' on that booty!" Lilly suddenly gasped as she got an idea for her next Superwoman video. She would do an impression of Nicki Minaj and title it "What if Nicki Minaj was fat?"

Lilly hadn't incorporated her weight gain into her comedy videos up until now, but it was getting to the point where it was becoming unavoidable. Her viewers had noticed that she was obviously getting fatter, and trolls had been constantly pointing it out and leaving fat shaming comments on all her videos. Of course Lilly didn't care about haters, if anything it only amused her how triggered they were by her fatness. Lilly had been having so much fun eating whatever she wanted and enjoying her larger body, she wasn't going to stop any time soon just because of some rude internet comments. In fact, thinking about that gave her another video idea: "How Dumb People React to Fat Girls". Heck, she could gain even more weight just to upset them even more, and do videos on all the relatable struggles that fat girls face. After all, she was a comedian, so it was only natural for her to exploit her own obesity for comedy material.

"That settles it then," she thought. "I'll eat my way to becoming the fattest, funniest girl on YouTube!"

Lilly spent the next several weeks eating as much as she could, trying to increase her calorie intake as much as possible. She nearly doubled the amount of food she ate in her mukbang videos, and she even began stuffing herself off camera. Her weight gain quickly accelerated to the point that she had to keep buying new clothes every couple of days. But the best part was that as her weight ballooned, so did her subscriber count. People all over the world were fascinated by the ever expanding YouTube comedian. Her new gluttonous lifestyle had made her bigger than ever, in more ways than one.

One day Lilly woke up and struggled to heave herself out of bed. She got her camera out to begin vlogging and waddled over to her bathroom scale to weigh herself. She had last weighed in at 268 pounds, but this time when she stepped on the scale she realized that she couldn't see the number past her belly anymore. "Uh oh," she said worriedly to her vlog camera, "Looks like it might be time to get a talking scale. I've become a little too much woman for this one to handle." She slapped her fat gut for emphasis, then turned her camera off to go shoot her next Superwoman video, titled "Clothes Shopping as a Thin Girl vs as a Fat Girl."
11313.title: Super FAT Woman

choices: Lilly's friends and family try to get her to lose weight
113132.content:
Lilly grunted loudly as she struggled to pull her pants on. Today she was filming her parody of the new live action Aladdin remake, titled "If Princess Jasmine was a BBW". The Jasmine costume that she had ordered didn't quite seem to fit, as Lilly's weight gain showed no signs of slowing down any time soon. She had even taken her nonstop growth into account while ordering the costume and made sure to get it several sizes larger than she had been at the moment, yet she still seemed to have already outgrown it. "Damn, why does Chipotle have to be so delicious?" Lilly lamented as she continued to struggle with the costume. Eventually she managed to squeeze her nearly 400 pound body into it after several minutes of attempting to suck in her giant gut. Once the costume was finally on, Lilly took a few minutes to relax and admire herself in the mirror. She looked like a morbidly obese Princess Jasmine, exactly the look she was going for.

"I'm the sexiest Jasmine ever," Lilly thought, fondling her big brown belly. Not only had she become completely addicted to junk food, she had also become convinced that the more weight she gained, the more attractive she was. She absolutely loved the way she looked now that she was obese and often fantasized about how she would look if she got even fatter, and thus even more beautiful.

Lilly snapped a quick selfie in her Jasmine costume and posted it to Instagram with the caption "Princess Jasmine looking hot af". She then left to go to the set of her new video, her thunder thighs rubbing and her massive ass and belly jiggling wildly all the way. Everyone on set got quite the eyeful of the obese Indian woman as she was already out of breath from just that small amount of exercise. "Okay...everyone," Lilly panted, "I'm...here. We...can...start...filming...soon. I...just...need...something...to...eat...first."

The Fat Jasmine video went on to become a viral hit, which only ended up encouraging Lilly to gain weight even faster than before. She added weight gain shakes to her daily diet and started going to all-you-can-eat buffets on a regular basis. As time went on, Lilly rapidly grew larger and larger. Her belly grew outwards and began hanging down over her thighs until it eventually went past her knees. Her ass grew so huge and wide that she became taller sitting down than standing up. Her back and thighs developed several fat rolls, her arms became huge flabby wings, and her face developed extremely fat cheeks and multiple chins. Lilly had become fatter than she had ever imagined possible, and she loved every sexy pound of her new body. There was just one problem.

After waking up from a food coma resulting from a particularly intense gorging session, Lilly quickly realized that she could no longer stand up. No matter how hard she tried, her body was simply to heavy for her own muscles to lift. She had officially eaten herself into immobility. Unable to move, all she could do was simply lay there and think about how amazing it felt to be so impossibly fat.
113132.title: Lilly keeps gaining until she's immobile

choices: Lilly fails and gains even more weight
1131321.content:
Once Lilly was properly equipped with a mobility scooter to help her get around now that she had become too fat to walk, her friends and family decided they had to step in and confront her about her weight gain. They didn't want to hurt her feelings before, but now that she had officially become immobile due to her size they figured this whole thing had gone far enough. Lilly's parents, along with her friends Jaz and Humble the Poet, decided to stage an intervention for her in her room.

"Lilly, you really should lose some weight. We're worried about you," her mother said in a serious tone.

"Oh, you guys don't need to worry about me, I'm fine. I can be healthy at any size," Lilly insisted while pouring the remnants of a box of doughnut holes into her mouth.

"Well it's not just your health, it's your public image," her father added. Lilly gave her parents an angry look.

"How dare you. I'm beautiful just the way I am. In fact, ALL fat people are beautiful," Lilly said angrily.

"That's not what they meant," Humble replied, handing Lilly a tablet. Lilly took it with her pudgy, swollen hand and saw a news article with the headline "YouTube Star Lilly Singh PROMOTES OBESITY!!!!" The article went on to say that due to Lilly's popularity on YouTube, her weight gain had inspired many of her young fans to gain weight themselves, resulting in an obesity epidemic in high schools across the country. It further went on to vilify her for spreading fat positivity on social media and claimed that she was promoting an unhealthy lifestyle and generally being irresponsible as an online influencer.

"Whatever," Lilly said dismissively, tossing the tablet on the ground. "Like I care what some stupid gossip site thinks. Who wrote that stupid tabloid garbage anyway?"

"The Wall Street Journal," Jaz answered.

"Okay, fine," Lilly said, sounding defeated. "If everybody thinks I should lose weight, I guess I'll give it a try. I sure am going to miss doing this though." Lilly grabbed a can of whip cream and began spraying it directly into her mouth. Everybody gave her a wide-eyed look. "Don't worry, I swear I'll start dieting tomorrow," she said reassuringly.
1131321.title: Obesity intervention

choices: People loved it! Everyone was excited to see thwit favorite blimp keep on growin
People disliked it- maybe there's not as much support as she hoped.
1131322.content:
Lilly reached over for her camera, which she had left on the end table next to the couch she was sitting in, now immobile. It took some reaching, as her immense flabby body now filled the couch entirely, her butt covering all the cushions, her back rolls pouring over the backboard, her stomach so big that it went down to the floor, and rested where she used to have a coffee table, and her love handles actually spilling out over the armrests on both sides of the couch, actually partially resting on the same end table her camera was on. She made a note to just start keeping it on her own body. She raised a flabby, thick arm with the camera in her hands, and turned it on with a pudgy finger, beginning to film a vlog.

"Yo what up world? It's your- urp- Whoops, s'cuse me. But, as I was saying, it's your girl Lilly Singh and I have a super duper exciting announcement! Here, watch this." She angled her camera, pointing it at the sea of fat around her thighs, each of her legs have gotten so enormous fat that they were thicker around just the ankles than an ordinary girl's waistline. She tried to stand up, kicking her legs a little bit, trying to bend her knee- which she couldn't do much because of how encased in flab it was. After a moment of uselessly wiggling her foot around, showing off how even her feet have gotten so fat that the socks she wore looked tight and stretched to their limit. She pointed the camera back at her fat face, a big grin between her softball sized chubby cheeks and four chins.

"I'm immobile! We all knew this was gonna happen guys, thank you so much for sticking with me, I couldn't have done it without you all. But don't worry, this doesn't mean I'm gonna slow down! I have a ton of ideas on how to celebrate getting to this point. First of all, I'm gonna make a special video where I weigh myself for the first time in months. And then! As a part two to that video, I'll get a whole bunch of food of all different kinds and put it all on a scale, until it weighs as much as I do, and then I'm gonna try and eat it all in one sitting! Then if I manage to do that, I'm gonna keep on eating whatever's left over!" Lilly laughed, rubbing her gigantic belly and giving it a good slap, so It'd jiggle.

"Oh! One other thing I was thinking, and I think you guys are gonna like this one. After that whole thing where I eat my weight again, I'm gonna host a special stream where everyone in the chat can suggest something for me to eat! I'll have people reading through the chat to make sure none of your guy's suggestions get missed, you can make more than one suggestion- as many as you guys want, and it'll go on until I've eaten every single thing you guys want me to!" Remember to subscribe, especially if you wanna see a whole lot more Lilly Singh in the world!" She said happily, before signing off.

Later, after she posted the video, she was gorging herself as usual. Now immobile, her friends and family had brought her the mountains of high calorie junk food she'd grown accustomed to, and She ate away, using her own expansive flab as a table to hold her meal, so it was all within her pudgy arms reach. Lilly was delighted to see all the positive feedback she got on her announcement. Of course there were a few haters who expressed disgust about her size, but at that point so many people had fully accepted and embraced her obesity and continued growth that the haters were lost. A lot of news sites and commentary channels all made videos about Lilly's immobility, too, which served to draw a lot of new viewers and new attention to her channel, causing her subscriber and view count to blow up dramatically. Of course, they weren't the only numbers that went up like crazy.

Over the next few weeks Lilly's content was packed with stuff relating to food, eating, or how fat she was- usually all three. She made a mukbang video where the challenge was to eat until her feet got so fat that they burst out of her socks (the only piece of clothing she hadn't completely outgrown by then), and she pulled it off successfully before celebrating with a fast food and cake binge. She wrote a bunch of her comedy sketch videos about her fat too. There was one where she crushed the couch under her enormous butt, and they tried to find a new couch but nothing was big enough to hold her, so they just sat on her body and used it as a big couch. In another one, they tried to cover up her naked body, but no clothes could fit on her. There were plenty of gratuitous shots of her friends grabbing onto her bountiful flab, trying to squeeze XXXXXL stretchy yoga pants over her massively thick legs (a lot of emphasis placed on her thighs, butt, and feet), but they couldn't even get a single pant leg up to her knee. In the end, they had to literally use a circus tent and put it on her as a shirt. The payoff of the whole video was that she ate until she outgrew the tent too, it ripping at the seams as her flab bulged through the tears as she continued to eat and grow until it was just scraps.

About a month or two after she became immobile, on a nice sunny day, Lilly was hanging out in her backyard, by the side of her pool. She was absolutely gigantic, weighing in at a staggering 25,000 pounds, her butt was resting up against the wall of her house, rising up higher than her head, as her belly was cooling off in her pool, big enough to fill a majority of it on its own. She was a complete blob, fatter than three hippos combined, her pudgy hands and feet were poking comedically out of her crazy thick limbs- she could kinda uselessly wiggle them, but not much else. She had a whole team of feeders who she brought on board, mostly consisting of eager fans who had fallen in love with her increasingly obese form and had been loyal followers since she could still waddle, they would all dart around and carry as much food as they could possibly carry up to her head, having to climb her mountainous body and actually stand on her love handles or back rolls to get close enough to reach her mouth and stuff it with more greasy fatty sugary junk food. She also had a camera man, to film her vlogs for her while standing on her belly, or getting off to get a full body shot and show her audience how much bigger she was than the last video. Of course, Lilly would always watch these videos herself, it excited her to see how enormous she was, and with every burger or cake or pizza that vanished into her sprawling gut, it excited her that she was still getting bigger. She'd even asked for her feeders to keep stuffing her in her sleep- that way she'd always get to wake up fatter than she fell asleep. Lilly felt amazing, she was certain that she'd never been sexier, and her fans were quick to agree. She remembered back when she first hit 1000 pounds- how huge she felt. It almost made her laugh, half a ton felt like nothing now that she was more than twelve tons. Her dream had come true, she was the fattest and sexiest girl ever!

The again...she remembered hearing that some of the heaviest whales recorded were almost 200,000 pounds. Which meant she still had some room to grow- and plenty of food to eat!

1131322111.content:
Lilly was thrilled to be offered a job as the new host of a late night talk show on NBC. She was going to be replacing Carson Daly in the 1:30 AM time slot that almost no one watched anyway, but Lilly was determined to make the show relevant by making her status as the world's fattest woman a selling point. She spent the next several weeks crafting her opening monologue for the premiere episode during brief breaks in between pig out sessions. Despite having surpassed her weight goal, Lilly's appetite had not subsided at all so she continued to spend at least 12 hours a day gorging herself. Naturally she kept gaining weight because of this, which complicated some of her show's preparation.

NBC had to hire a special team of tailors to create Lilly's wardrobe since no piece of clothing on Earth would fit her. However, due to her constant expansion she outgrew every outfit by the time it was finished. They ended up having to just make all of her outfits several times bigger than her using extremely stretchy and elastic material.

By the time the day arrived to shoot the first episode Lilly weighed over 300,000 pounds. Several trucks and helicopters had to be used to transport her to the studio, which was specially built to be large enough to fit her inside.

Lilly was very proud of the show that she had created. Every sketch involved her eating so she wouldn't have to go hungry while filming and almost every joke was about her fatness. She also made sure that her writing staff was entirely made up of obese young women so most of the show's material would be from a pro-fat perspective. Any writer who weighed less than 300 pounds was put on a strict high calorie diet and fattened up by some of Lilly's feeders.

The big moment was finally here: the show's opening credits rolled and a giant curtain opened to reveal Lilly Singh, the world's fattest woman sitting in an extremely tight pantsuit that looked like it was about three donuts away from bursting off of her body. Lilly waved the world's pudgiest hand and smiled excitedly, causing at least ten of her chins to jiggle uncontrollably for more than half a minute.

"Hello, Skinny America!" Lilly said, enthusiastically greeting the at-home audience. "I know what you're thinking: 'Who is this fat tub of lard and what has she done with Carson Daly? Did she EAT him?!'" Lilly then looked straight into the camera with a faux serious expression on her face. "Why yes, yes I did. And he was DELICIOUS! MWAHAHAHAHA!" she faked an evil laugh while licking her fingers, causing light chuckles from the studio audience (which, just like Lilly's writing staff, was made entirely of fat women). "I'm kidding of course. My name is Lilly Singh, and as some of you may know I am a YouTube comedian who recently became the fattest woman in the history of the world, and even more recently became the fattest living thing on Earth. Now I know you're used to only seeing skinny people on television, but I'm hoping you'll stick around for the rest of the show because we're going to have a lot of big fat fun!" Lilly attempted to do a silly dance which just ended up making her whole body jiggle while the overweight women in the audience cheered.

After the filming of the episode finally wrapped up, Lilly let out a huge sigh of relief and immediately dug into a giant chocolate cake. The show was a lot of fun to do but it was still slightly nerve wracking having to wait until it aired and find out what people thought of it, so Lilly attempted to calm her nerves the only way she knew how: by stuffing herself silly with the most fattening food she could get her blubbery hands on.

The livestream came on, on a casual Friday night- Plenty of people had some time off to stay up nice and late to watch it.

As it started, instead of going to gameplay or reading the chat or anything like that, viewers of KittyKatGaming were treated to a webcam video of the channel's host, Suzy Berhow, smiling into the camera, wearing her signature style of makeup, with her hair nicely curled and a cutesy little headband with some cat ears on it.

"Hey everyone! Thank you for showing up to this stream!" She began, "now, I'm going to get right into the game in juuust a second, but I wanted to take a moment to do something- And share something with you guys." Suzy reached off camera, before bringing a large, full looking Wendy's bag into view, holding it up proudly and smiling.

"Ta-daa! Now- you might be wondering why this is exciting- I mean, obviously aside from Wendy's having great food- I'm always excited to get it. But, this time it's special!" She said, opening the bag and taking out a large quarter-pounder baconator, the cheese still warm enough to ooze out a little bit as she lifted it.

"KittyKatGaming actually recently got sponsored by Wendy's! I know- I couldn't believe it either! I wish I could've filmed Arin's reaction- He was so jealous." She said, giggling a little, "now- KittyKatGaming viewers can get a special discount by going to the Wendy's website, and using the special code 'KittyKatFresh'- that's Kat with a K, of course. So, everyone in the chat, if you wanna help me out, and get some delicious food for even cheaper than normal, go use that code!"

"But that's not even the best part," Suzy continued, bringing the burger to her own lips, and smiling, wiggling her eyebrows a bit mischievously. "As part of the deal, I actually get to have free Wendy's! How great is that?" She said, before taking a big bite of the succulent burger, to emphasize her point. She mumbled something when her mouth was full, but quickly finished the bite.

"So- Sorry to keep you guys waiting for so long, I'm gonna get right back into playing the game, but I wanted to let you all know what was going on, and- I'm sorry if you don't like to hear me eating- 'cause I'm gonna be snacking a lot more during these streams!" Suzy exclaimed excitedly, before switching from the webcam to the capture, and beginning her stream proper.


What Suzy had said was true. She did snack a lot more during her streams. And during her daily life, whatever she happened to be doing she usually had no less than a box of fries and a soda on hand. Empty Wendy's bags started to pile up in her room, and as the days went on and she happily continued to take advantage of the sponsorship, it started to show on her waistline too. She didn't do very much exercise, being a bit of a nerd- She liked to stay in and play games, manage her business stuff, and work on makeup. Colleen turned the camera off after finishing her Miranda Sings German candy-tasting video, which had been quite fun to do. Some of the candies were actually pretty delicious, her favorites being knoppers and duplos. Jess and Alyssa had actually sent her a pretty huge amount of candy with hundreds of different varieties but she had only eaten a little bit of it on camera. Colleen began snacking on the candy simply thinking it tasted good, but the more she ate the more she became addicted to it. In fact, her addiction spiraled out of control fairly quickly and within a couple of hours Colleen was stuffing her face uncontrollably. Bite after bite of delicious, fattening German candy disappeared into her mouth as she tried and failed to satisfy her new addiction.

Colleen was eating so much so fast that within mere minutes she was noticeably gaining weight. Her shirt rose up as her belly began to swell outward, causing her pants to tighten and put pressure on her belt. She managed to break herself away from eating for a few seconds to undo her belt, which immediately made the button on her pants pop off and fly across the room.

Colleen was already looking chubby and had gained over 30 pounds in a very short amount of time, and there were no signs of her slowing down anytime soon. If anything, it seemed like this was only the beginning...
1331.title: Candy addiction

choices: Everyone is shocked by her weight gain
13311.content:
If Colleen had bothered to take a minute to look up at the clock and weigh herself instead of stuffing her face nonstop she would've been shocked to find that she had just gained 50 pounds in an hour, almost a pound a minute. Alas, the gluttonous YouTuber now only had one thing on her mind: eating. And so she ate. And grew fatter and fatter and fatter. Even as her pants ripped Colleen thought nothing of it and continued gorging herself. Her ass grew wider, her thighs thickened, her breasts grew several cup sizes and outgrew her bra. Her arms became plump and flabby, her face grew chubby cheeks and an extra chin or two, and her belly became round and fat, hanging down almost to her knees and covering her lap. The sheer amount of food she was eating was causing her to gain weight at a record pace that would have shocked anyone who saw what was happening to her, but Colleen was too deep into her addiction to care.

As Colleen's weight soared past 400 pounds, then 500, she became so fat that even in her trance-like state she became vaguely aware of the changes happening to her body, if only because of the ways her new obesity was now hindering her ability to eat so fast.

"Mmm, this stuff is so good," she thought. "More. Must. Eat. More." Colleen squinted at her blubbery hands with blurred vision as she attempted to reach for more candy. "Huh, that's weird. I don't remember putting on baseball gloves." She lazily attempted to take the gloves off until realizing with horror that they were her own hands and she was now morbidly obese. However, her addiction was so strong at this point that even this realization wasn't strong enough to slow down her eating. Colleen continued to stuff herself and pack on more pounds even as she was now aware of how much of a fat blob she was becoming. She wanted to call for help but all she could do was helplessly shovel more candy into her fat face.

Eventually her belly grew so fat that she could no longer reach any of the candy on the table in front of her which consequently forced her to stop eating momentarily. This made her snap out of her addiction and take a good look at her body. Colleen was now the fattest woman she had ever seen, even fatter than any of the women on My 600lb Life. She was far too fat to be able to properly weigh herself, but she estimated that she must now be somewhere between 950 and 1000 pounds, when just a mere 24 hours earlier she was only around 120.

Colleen decided that she needed to alert everyone to her weight gain so she tried to find her phone to tweet about it. Her clothes were now in shreds on the floor but she ended up finding her phone underneath one of her new fat folds. She struggled to use the touch screen with her new blubbery fingers but she eventually got the hang of it and opened up Twitter to compose a new tweet:

"Ok, I did a german candy tasting video as Miranda and now I'm obsessed with German candy. I've gained 850 pounds in 24 hours. NOMNOMNOM"

It took her a few minutes to fully type it all out but she finally finished it and used her pudgy index finger to push the "send tweet" button.

It was an atypical day for Jojo. Not much was going on in her life. She had finally gotten a break from filming, both for her Youtube channel and for all the other kinds of media she's involved in. All of her moves seemed very similar to her, and were very boring at that. Despite the praise her fans gave her, she wanted to change up her routine. She decided on trying out new dance moves, and looked up unique ways of dancing. She scrolled through Google for what seemed like hours, but nothing seemed to interest her. Jojo was about to give up her search and go eat lunch, but she found an article that finally caught her interest. The title alone piqued her curiosity: 'How to be overweight and still dance well' While Jojo knew she was nowhere near overweight, she was still interested in the dance technique that would allow fat people to dance well.

The article mostly talked about a lady called Whitney Thore, who had developed a dance move that allowed overweight women to still dance fashionably. There was a video at the end, so Jojo decided to watch that to see the actual dance move. Throughout the video, Jojo was intrigued with the dance move and thought it was she had been looking for. So she decided to try it out. However, she found it difficult to reenact the dance she saw in the video. After watching it several times over, Jojo realized that she was missing something. She wasn't overweight like the Whitney lady in the video was. Jojo was determined to preform the dance, as she thought it would help her improve as a dancer, so she set out to put on weight. How much she didn't know. She just knew it had to be enough to be able to preform the dance. But then Jojo came upon another problem. How would she get fat? She could try asking her parents to help, but they might not approve of the idea. They were too overprotective anyways, but they did have regularly available transportation. The only other option she could think of would be to scavenge for food herself. It would take more time, but there would be no one else to interfere with her plan. Jojo eventually decided on...

"Um, I was thinking pizza, donuts, ice cream...ya know? Just anything that'll make me fatter!" She cheered once more. Her father gulped at the statement. His daughter was getting out of hand. But he was in no place to say anything. He just thought she would stop wanting to be fat once she learned about how cruel people can be. Jojo's mom wasn't nearly as nihilistic, but was still concerned for her daughter. She always thought Jojo was a little too skinny anyways.

After an hour or two of food ordering and waiting, there was finally a knock on the door. "Oh yay! My food is here!" Jojo screeched. She got up to get the door, but was stopped by her mother. "Stay seated dear, you'll burn calories by running around like that" Jojo looked at her mother with a face of realization, and then went to go sit back down. Her parents quickly came back with pans upon dishes of food. There seemed to be literal tons of food. And this was only the first delivery! There would definitely be more to come. There might be piles of food lying around if this pace kept up. Despite the ludicrous amount of food, Jojo only focused on eating it. She opened a pizza box and immediately dug in. The pizza was incredibly greasy, which made Jojo pleased not only because it tasted delicious, but because she knew it was more fattening. She finished that box, which was an extra large, extra cheesy pizza, and started on the next pizza which was the exact same thing.

This continued with all the food that arrived. And as she ate, Jojo got her wish. She was most definitely fatter than when she had first started eating all the food. Most of the weight went to her lower body though, her butt and thighs growing the most. Her stomach and breasts did grow out, and were much larger than most other girls her age, but less so than her lower body. Her face also chubbed up, but it was even less than her upper body so it wasn't very noticeable. And despite her massive weight gain, Jojo hadn't even put a dent into the food that kept arriving. She was starting to get worn out, due to all her excitement and also because of her weight gain, but she pushed on, determined to keep eating and grow fatter for her fans. This new dance move would surely be a hit, she just knew it.

155212112211.content:
As was normal for a sunny weekday afternoon, JoJo was lounging comfortably on a recliner chair on the decking, piggishly gorging herself on the miniature mountain of food assembled on the nearby table.

Enjoying the rays of warming sunlight playing upon her pale flesh, JoJo wriggled comfortably on the recliner, sending ripples of motion through the heaving orb of fat that was her exposed belly. On such pleasant days, JoJo liked to strip down to her underwear. Sure, she told herself it was so she could top up her tan, but in reality she enjoyed freeing her tummy from the restricting grip of clothes that pinched against its surging bulges and swelling rolls.

Lounging next to JoJo, and similarly underdressed, was her dance teacher Abby. The belly-heavy dance teacher had joined JoJo so that they could spend the day “practicing” for a competition. Strangely, neither of them seemed to mind when the promised dancing failed to happen, and the day lapsed into a non-stop feast.

JoJo’s life had become an endless series of such pleasurable experiences. One day she might spend the morning snacking and breakfasting, then head out to the food court at the mall to meet one of her overfed friends, before making her way to an evening spent at an all-you-can-eat buffet with another one of the girls.

When Abby visited, the two hungry ladies had previously done more to carry on the pretence of meeting for a dance session. JoJo would slip on a figure-hugging leotard and maybe even start dancing before sitting down on her fat bottom and eating herself into a stupor over the next several hours with Abby stop teaching to join. These days, however, JoJo had long ago left leotard behind and Abby left yoga pants behind. Their immense appetites and slothful lifestyles had blown both girls up to the point where getting their colossal bodies into stretchy clothes would have required the services of about 5 burly men.

Instead, the bloated beauties were happy to slip off their constraining clothes and lie comfortably in their underwear, creamy fat flesh spilling out everywhere and thickening rolls of blubber on full display.

JoJo’s mom (Jessalynn) walked lightly out onto the decking, carrying a platter loaded high with chicken fajitas. Placing it between the women, she was careful to hand each munching lady a fajita before she turned to go. Raising them to their hungry mouths simultaneously, the supine women looked like giant babies, helplessly trapped on their backs and whining for feeding.

The average figure of the mom provided a stunning visual contrast that brought home the scale of JoJo and Abby’s obesity. A lithe 150lbs, Jessalynn’s slightly above average body flowed elegantly as she moved, the graceful flex of muscles visible as she delicately withdrew from the decking and headed back to the house. In juxtaposition to her average figure, JoJo and Abby were like some sort of ridiculous parody of the female form. Where average’s hips made a graceful curve, JoJo’s bulged out – oozing over the edges of her widened chair and undulating with even the slightest movement. A single one of her fat-filled thighs would have dwarfed average’s tight waist. Abby’s monstrous belly – rising from her midriff like a dome of jello – was an obscene mockery of the washboard tautness of the mom’s well-toned abdomen. The soft, flabby blubber that carpeted the girl’s bodies was a bizarre contrast to the firm suppleness of the mom’s waifish figure.

The sunny afternoon passed in a predictable blaze of gluttonous contentment for the stretched out porkers. Their heaving bellies swelled with the deluge of food they crammed remorselessly into their greedy mouths – endlessly chomping, chewing and guzzling. Through their lazy self-indulgence, both girls had become utterly dependent upon the hard-working domestic help. Left to their own devices, JoJo and Abby would never have been able to make the multiple trips back and forth to the kitchen necessary to sustain their endless feast. The only motion JoJo had made all day was to stumble clumsily to the hallway to greet Abby when she arrived, hugging the ballooning woman awkwardly over their ponderous bellies. Since they’d both waddled cumbersomely out onto the decking both heavy girls hadn’t moved a muscle, happily surrendering the task of supporting their bulky bodies to the soft recliners.

Sturdy though they were, the reinforced recliners still creaked and groaned in protest at the weighty loads they had to carry. The squeaks and strains of the overloaded seats mingled with the noise of greedy chewing and rumbling tummies to produce a typical afternoon serenade at the Siwa household. Even the fitness-fanatic neighbour had grown used to hearing the familiar noises of JoJo’s afternoon gorging.

Smiling happily, JoJo ignored the ominous creaking sounds coming from her chair and stretched out a grasping, chubby hand for another plump chocolate éclair. Her piggy instincts made her heave herself closer to the snack table, sending great waves of jiggling rolling through her gelatinous flesh. JoJo’s fat rolls wobbled in unison as her heft settled heavily back down on the seat. The exertion was unpleasant, but she just couldn’t resist the urge to reach more of those deliciously chocolatey delights – her belly called out to be filled with them, and JoJo was eager to oblige.

Abby had also shifted her bulk so as to be closer to the food piled on the table. Rolling onto her side, her gargantuan gut now slumped heavily over the edge of the chair, spilling flabbily out into space and bulging perilously in the air. The thick folds of her blubber quivered with her every greedy lunge she made for some sweet treat, edging the swollen mass of her tummy further over the side of the chair and upsetting the delicate balance of the seat more and more. Contentedly cramming the delicious pastries down her gullet, the bloated belly-heavy babe barely noticed the peril her ponderous gut was putting her in.

Blind as she was to her own unstable position, Abby couldn’t but notice a new noise coming from JoJo’s direction. Joining the familiar metallic squeaks of the chair and the greedy gobbling noises of its occupant, Abby could hear a new sound. The creaking, ripping noise of fabric under extreme stress. Puzzled, she paused in glutting herself for a moment, and peered over cautiously at her companion. JoJo was now leaning over the edge of her seat, the armrest swallowed up by the fat that was pouring over it, and grabbing fistfuls of bon bons to shovel past her sugar-dusted lips. With her belly fat bulging over the side of the recliner, it was possible to see JoJo’s white cotton panties, stretching heroically over the vast swell of her lower belly roll. With a gasp, Abby realised that the noise was coming from these very same over-taxed panties!

“Oh! Oh my! JoJo! Oh dear!”

Abby wheezed a warning, gasping for air past her mouthful of sugar puff pastry. Her fat friend was oblivious to the danger, and Abby stifled a yelp as she saw a tear start to spread across the drum-tight cotton.

JoJo’s distended stomach was quickly overwhelming the fabric – the split spread and into the gap surged the fleshy bulge of JoJo’s underbelly. Still the gorging blonde stuffed herself, blissfully unaware that her gluttony was about to take away her modesty.

Abby watched in shocked fascination as she watched the flabby adipose conquer the fragile cotton. She wanted to help her friend, but she just couldn’t bring herself to stop chowing down long enough to speak a complete sentence that might have alerted JoJo. At last, as the threads started to give way completely, Abby squealed loudly enough to break JoJo’s concentration on her of double dark chocolate muffin.

“JoJo!! Watch out!”

Abby was pointing whining like a stuck piglet – JoJo, puzzled, shifted to try to look at her lower abdomen. Fat rolls bunched up and quivered with the movement, and JoJo’s girth finally heaved its way through the final protesting strands of her gallant panties, which burst off with a loud *snap!*.

Unable to see past her voluminous cleavage, and squirming clumsily, JoJo overexerted herself trying to see the extent of the damage. Her blubbery bulk was exhausting her pitiful muscles fast – one unwise shift would send her perilously close to the edge of her recliner – but in her panic to cover up, JoJo was unaware of such dangers.

“Oh my, JoJo, be careful!” Abby gasped as JoJo’s awkward flailing caused yet more of her soft flab to pour carelessly over the armrest.

“Yup! Thanks for bringing in the food, by the way. It’s just so much work to go get it now.” Rhianna said. “Well, George did most of the walking for me before he left, but you’re welcome! Now let’s get started so I can eat!” Will urged. And with that, Rhianna hit the record button, starting their new video. They had asked their fans to send their Skype usernames so they could video chat with them. “So today we’re going to chat with you guys, since you’ve all requested it so much. Rhianna’s here with me because no one else could.” Will said. Rhianna giggled before saying, “Hey guys!” “Well, let’s get started.” Will said before he typed in the randomly-picked fan’s username. As he typed he grabbed a burger from the bag of fast food and shoved it in his mouth. Rhianna did the same with some fries.

“Up first we have CatLover98.” Will said before calling the fan. She answered the call with a “Ohmygod! I didn’t think Iwd gewt piwcked.” She clearly had a mouthful of food yet was still excited by getting called she didn’t have time to think about swallowing. Rhianna laughed while Will greeted the girl. “Uh, hey there. You probably know us, but introduce yourself for the video.” “Oh, right! I’m Selena, and I love your guys videos!” Her voice still trembling from all the excitement. As the chat went on, Selena explained that she had decided to get fat from seeing SootHouse grow to be so big. She even got up to show off her bigger body. She weighed 400 pounds and had a pear shaped body. Selena also apologized for eating her donuts earlier, saying she had only recently gotten the chance to eat her mid-morning snack.

After a while, Will and Rhianna decided they should talk with more fans and said their goodbyes to Selena. Then Will went and typed in the next username while eating another burger. With a mouthful, Will said, “Newxt we hawve TheGuy910.” Will swallowed his meal before calling, Rhianna making sure to do the same. “Oh god, I didn’t think I’d get picked!” the guy they were calling said. Will and Rhianna laughed before talking to the guy some more. They found out his name was Josh, and he had gotten into gaining because of SootHouse like Selena had. Josh explained that he was 600 pounds and was in the middle of eating pizza right as Will and Rhianna called. As the two were talking to Josh, they noticed he was mostly fat in his stomach, but everywhere else seemed to have an even distribution. He had on some shorts and a button up shirt which had skin showing in between the buttons.

Eventually, Will and Rhianna decided it was time to talk to their next fan and said their goodbyes once more. The two were nearing the end of their fast food, which would worry them, but they knew their friends would keep them supplied with food. “For the last fan, we have FanGerl21.” Will said as he punched in the final username. When they started the call, Rhianna and Will were greeted by an ear-piercing scream. “It’s really you guys! I’m like your biggest fan!” The girl on the other side nearly screamed. She looked really fat, not nearly as big as Will or Rhianna, but still fat nonetheless. She had one of their ‘Eat Pant’ shirts that mostly covered her boobs because of how fat she was. “So um, I’m Genevieve and I love your videos.” “Thanks Genevieve. If you don’t mind me asking, how much do you weigh?” Rhianna asked. “Oh, I weigh around 800 pounds, and it’s all thanks to you guys! You showed me how great it was to eat and get fat!” As she was talking she took a bite out of a tortilla and a slurp of some kind of soda. Apparently she had gotten Taco Bell and was eating it when they had called her. Genevieve went on to talk about how she used to be really thin, and how Will and Rhianna influenced her decision to gain the most. She even showed her gratefulness by dancing for them, causing her body to jiggle quite a bit. After that, however, Will and Rhianna decided to leave and give Genevieve time to rest. “It was great talking to you, Genevieve, but we have to go now.” Will said. “Bye guys! I love your content!” Were her parting words.

Then Will and Rhianna decided to finally end the video, since they were all out of fast food. “Thanks for sending in your usernames guys, and we hope you enjoyed the video!” Will said, ending the recording for the video. “Phew, that was a lot of work. I’m so tired now.” Rhianna whined. “Yeah, me too. I’m so hungry.” Will added. As if to save them, Jack came in with more food. He had several boxes of donuts and cupcakes, and two huge cakes. “I heard the word ‘starving’.” He joked as he placed the food down near Will and Rhianna. “You’re a lifesaver, Jack!” Will said as he tore into one of the cakes. Rhianna didn’t even thank him and just started to devour cupcakes. Jack laughed before leaving to tell everyone else Will and Rhianna were doing just fine.
1553133111112222212211.title: Will and Rhianna with Fans

15531331111122222122112.content:
A little while later, Jack came back into the recording room where Will and Rhianna were eating the food he gave them. “Hey guys, we’re going to the buffet. How’s that-” “YES!” They both shouted. Jack was surprised by how fast they responded despite the food in front of them, but knew he shouldn’t have expected anything else from the two fatties. “We’ll leave whenever you’re done with your food.” Jack finished before leaving the room.

Not even half an hour later, Will and Rhianna came waddling into the front room where the rest of the group was snacking on miscellaneous scraps the two pigs of the house hadn’t bothered to finish. “Let’s go!” Rhianna whined. “I’m starving! We need to leave now!” Will joined. The group sighed and left to go to their cars. They had to get new, remodeled cars because of their size. They fit most of the group, but Will and Rhianna had gotten so fat they didn’t even fit in them anymore. They had to shove Will into one car and Rhianna in another, struggling to do both tasks. They didn’t even bother to try and put their seatbelts on because they knew it was a lost cause. Their massive weights would keep them down anyways.

It took awhile because of Will and Rhianna’s fat slowing the cars down, but the group eventually made it to the local buffet. Both of the fatties struggled to get out of the cars and into the restaurant, probably because they both tried to do so at once, but they didn’t care. All they were thinking about was the food. Their friends followed the two fatties into the buffet, noticing how surprised their server was by how fat Will and Rhianna were, and how intimidating they looked when they were hungry. They payed the server and went to a relatively large booth to fit their friends’ sizes.

Will and Rhianna promptly sat down in the booth, a little cramped by it, and waited for their friends. “We’re not gonna get the food ourselves!” Rhianna complained. “Yeah, who do you think we are! Getting our own food is too much work!” Will also whined. The group sighed and went to grab numerous plates for their friends. While they were getting the food George came up with an idea. “Guys, what if we have Will and Rhianna have an eating contest? We can get tons of views and fatten them up in the process!” He exclaimed. Everyone thought it was a great idea and decided to go through with it. They came back to Will and Rhianna with piles of plate of food, and Charlie filming the whole thing. One of the guys had left a decent camera in their cars, so luckily the video would at least look nice. Without anyone telling them to go, Will and Rhianna just dug into their food like vicious carnivores would their fallen prey.

Charlie made sure to get good shots of both Will and Rhianna, making sure to get all the crumbs, sauce and grease from the food that got onto them and their clothes in frame. The group had convinced Will and Rhianna to put on some clothes and they, begrudgingly so, complied, though neither of their clothes covered all of their bodies. Will was digging into some burgers, causing him to get grease and ketchup all around his mouth and on his upper body, mainly his moobs. He let out several belches and farts while he was eating, as if it was a natural thing for him or any person to be so gassy. Rhianna was acting similarly, eating a plate of spaghetti, getting tomato sauce all over herself. She let out some belches, but not nearly as much as Will did. She also seemed to fall slightly behind Will in eating, but it wasn’t enough to put her out of the competition.

When Will was about halfway through his enormous plates of food, having devoured an entire turkey, numerous burgers, hotdogs and pastas, he decided to drink his soda. He grabbed one of the liter bottles and started to chug it down, letting out a huge belch after he finished. He did this for two more bottles before going back to eating the buffet food. Rhianna followed quickly behind, drinking down two liters of soda compared to Will’s three. While they were chugging soda and devouring food, neither noticed their clothes tearing. Will’s shirt that barely fit tore right above his belly and on his chest, revealing his huge moobs and the rest of his big belly. His shorts also tore, allowing people to see his underwear as well as more of his crack. Rhianna’s clothes tore in a similar manner, but her chest was luckily covered by her bra so they wouldn’t get kicked out.

About an hour after the two had started the competition, Will and Rhianna had eaten so much that their stomachs were resting on their booth’s table. Its creaks could be heard from the pressure it was under, and they only grew louder as Will and Rhianna grew larger. They kept letting out belches, which caused their bellies to vibrate, only furthering the damage to the table. Finally, after one big belch from eating some pizza and fries, Will finally broke the table under his fat belly. Soon after, he won the competition, Rhianna only falling on dish behind him. Everyone cheered for Will as Charlie ended the video, thanking their viewers for watching. As they approached their friend, he yelled, “More food. Now! I’m sooooo hungry!” The group agreed, piling more dishes of fattening food to feed their friend.

They all started to feed Will once they got back, stuffing him with more and more food that would surely add to his fattened frame. “Mmph, yeah. Ommph, more. Mooorrre. I’m so hungry.” Will said in between bites of food. He let out a fart as he was being fed, showcasing his growing laziness. The group would feed Will ice cream that would melt down his numerous chins, feed him doughnuts that would put crumbs and icing around his mouth, cupcakes, and even large cakes that would really fatten him up. Rhianna, unable to feed Will, not that she wanted to, decided to eat whatever food was leftover from Will’s desert feast.

Eventually, the group heard some creaking underneath Will, and they knew it wasn’t another one of his farts or belches grumbling in his stomach. Charlie, oblivious to what was going on, decided to shove a piece of cream pie into Will, sealing the booth’s fate. Will came crashing down, breaking the seat underneath him. “I’m surprised it survived for that long!” George joked. Everyone laughed, but Will complained about the lack of food soon after.

Once all the food was gone, the owners told them that the group that they had to leave because of the damages to the restaurant, and because of just how much they were eating. “Uh, we might have to get Will a pickup truck to get out of here.” Charlie joked, though the group knew he was half serious.
